text:
District Collector S. Jayandhi has instructed all banks here to inform elections officials about cash transactions of Rs. 10 lakh and above.

Any suspicious transactions of Rs. 1 lakh and above too should be brought to the notice of the election officials.Lead District Manager V. Ganesan said that the directives were given in accordance with the rules stipulated by the Election Commission.Mr. Ganesan added that all banks officials had been instructed to ensure that the personnel, including security guards, who carry cash from chest branches to ATMs, wore identity cards.

“They should be given proper documents for the money transfer,” he said.
title: Inform cash transactions, Collector tells banks
